Key Match Events: Cole Anthony scored 24 points for the Magic
Wendell Carter Jr. had a season-high 19 points off the bench for the Magic
Jalen Brunson and Mikal Bridges each scored 24 points for the Knicks
The Knicks were held to their lowest point total of the season in their season-high third straight loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Magic don’t let their offensive problems affect their defensive intensity
The Knicks, who average nearly 118 points, could never sustain a good flow without Towns
Others: The Magic outscored the Knicks 50-18 in bench points
The Knicks scored four straight points to get within six, then won a challenge to overturn a foul that was called on Josh Hart and get the ball back, but didn’t score
Orlando avoided a four-game sweep by winning the final meeting, keeping the lead in the all-time series at 68-66
